title: romision Thermal Underwear for Men Long Johns Fleece Lined Hunting Gear Bottom Top Set Base Layer for Cold Weather Gift
description: Extreme Warmth and Comfort: Made from 90% polyester and 10% spandex super soft fabric, they also help reduce pilling and shrinkage. Adding some extra cozy, warm fleece to the mix, our long johns amazingly help to tackle extreme cold weather conditions

Strong Moisture Wicking: The unique breathable, moisture-wicking fibers on our thermal underwear will wick away moisture to keep you dry with no sticky or clammy feeling so you can wear them all day for your work or snow adventure

4-Way Stretch: The design of the Four-way stretch make the reach and squat more comfortable while retaining excellent elasticity and durability for maximum mobility. Use high-quality stitching to beat super-active days and many muddy adventures

Easy Care Base Layer Set: Tagless design in order to obtain greater comfort. The highest dyeing fastness even after multiple washing will not fade and shrink. Fitted with fashion elastic band for added comfort to keep bottoms from falling down

Best Gift Choice: We stock these crew or turtle neck thermals for men in a wide range of sizes. If your family enjoys hunting;camping;snowboarding;skiing;cycling or running then it will be a great choice. A wonderful Gift for mens Christmas Birthday
